TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataConnectionFileCollection extends Microsoft.SharePoint.Administration.SPPersistedChildCollection`1<class Microsoft.Office.InfoPath.Server.Administration.DataConnectionFile> implements class Microsoft.SharePoint.Administration.Backup.IBackupRestore, class Microsoft.SharePoint.Administration.Backup.IBackupRestoreConfiguration
Public NotInheritable Class DataConnectionFileCollection Inherits SPPersistedChildCollection(Of DataConnectionFile) Implements IBackupRestoreConfiguration
type DataConnectionFileCollection = class inherit SPPersistedChildCollection<DataConnectionFile> interface IBackupRestoreConfiguration interface IBackupRestore

Docs.summary: Represents the available Universal Data Connection (UDC) files located in the central data connection store on the server farm.

remarks.para: The UDC files that are available in the central data connection store on the server farm are listed on the Manage Data Connection Files page of the Central Administration site. A version 2 UDC file with the *.udcx file extension is designed for use by browser-enabled form templates that render in the browser or in the InfoPath editor. Form templates that are not browser-enabled can also use UDC files, however only administrator approved form templates can use UDC files managed by this collection.

example.para: In the following example, the collection is used to loop through every UDC file on the server farm and write its display name to the console. Then the total number of UDC files on the server is written to the console.
example.code: Dim LocalFormsService As FormsService Dim LocalFarm As SPFarm Dim UdcCollection As DataConnectionFileCollection Dim UdcConnection As DataConnectionFile Dim CountUdcFiles As Integer = 0 Try LocalFarm = SPFarm.Local LocalFormsService = LocalFarm.Services.GetValue(Of FormsService)(FormsService.ServiceName) UdcCollection = LocalFormsService.DataConnectionFiles For Each UdcConnection In UdcCollection CountUdcFiles = CountUdcFiles + 1 Console.WriteLine("UDC file # " + CountUdcFiles.ToString() + ": " + UdcConnection.DisplayName) Next Console.WriteLine("Total UDC files on server: " + CountUdcFiles.ToString()) Console.Write("Press Enter to Continue") Console.ReadLine() Catch ex As Exception Console.WriteLine("Error: " + ex.Message) Console.Write("Press Enter to Continue") Console.ReadLine() End Try

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Not for public consumption. Use FormService.GetLocal().DataConnectionFiles instead.")

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool Add (string fullFileName, bool webAccessible, bool overwrite, string category);
.method public hidebysig instance bool Add(string fullFileName, bool webAccessible, bool overwrite, string category) cil managed
Public Function Add (fullFileName As String, webAccessible As Boolean, overwrite As Boolean, category As String) As Boolean
public: bool Add(System::String ^ fullFileName, bool webAccessible, bool overwrite, System::String ^ category);
override this.Add : string * bool * bool * string -> bool

Docs.param: The full path and file name of the Universal Data Connection (UDC) file, including the .udcx extension.
A boolean value indicating whether Microsoft InfoPath clients will be able to use the UDC file.
A boolean value indicating whether to overwrite an existing UDC file with the same name.
An optional string value containing the category to assign to the UDC file.
Docs.summary: Adds a data connection file to the collection with a series of parameters describing the connection.
Docs.returns: A boolean value indicating whether the operation was successful.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string[] Enumerate(string mode) cil managed
Public Function Enumerate (mode As String) As String()

Docs.param: The default value for is "a" or "all" to enumerate all UDC files in the collection, or "u" to enumerate only those UDC files that do not have dependent form templates.
Docs.summary: Enumerates the data connection files in the collection based on the mode.
Docs.returns: A one dimensional array of strings containing the file names of the enumerated data connection files.

example.para: In the following collection, a one dimensional array is used to capture the file name of all data connection files on the server by using the method.
example.code: Dim LocalFormsService As FormsService Dim LocalFarm As SPFarm Dim i As Integer = 0 Try LocalFarm = SPFarm.Local LocalFormsService = LocalFarm.Services.GetValue(Of FormsService)(FormsService.ServiceName) Dim strEnum() As String = UdcCollection.Enumerate("all") For i = 0 To strEnum.Length Console.WriteLine("Data Connection File " + i.ToString() + ": " + strEnum(i)) Next Console.Write("Press Enter to Continue") Console.ReadLine() Catch ex As Exception Console.WriteLine("Error: " + ex.Message) Console.Write("Press Enter to Continue") Console.ReadLine() End Try
